text: The Winnipeg Blue Bombers is a Canadian football team based in Winnipeg, Manitoba. It is part of the West Division of the Canadian Football League. The team started in 1930. It has won the league's Grey Cup championship ten times. The team's home stadium is called Investors Group Field. title: Winnipeg Blue Bombers
